data.comment: Import Export button text

data.comment: Show password button

data.name: HidePassword
data.comment: Hide Password button

data.name: Configuration_loadControls_Configuration_Utility
data.comment: Form title to display whne loading standard controls.

data.name: Configuration_LoadControlsProject_Configuration_Utility___Project_Settings
data.comment: Form title to display when loading project controls.

data.name: Connectivity_btnSSLPath_Click_Select_Certificate_File
data.comment: Select Certificate File Dialog Title.

data.name: Connectivity_btnSSLPath_Click_Certificate_Files
data.comment: Select Certificate Files - Certificate Files Filter.

data.name: Connectivity_btnSSLPath_Click_All_Files
data.comment: Select Certificate Files - All Files Filter.

data.name: ButtonText
data.comment: The Caption that appears on the button on the TortoiseSVN form

data.name: ErrorInUpdatesConnectionMessage
data.value: Ein Fehler ist aufgetreten beim Versuch, nach Aktualisierungen zu sehen: {0}
data.comment: The message to display when a connection error occurs while checking for updates

data.name: ErrorInUpdatesConnectionTitle
data.comment: The title of the message to display when an error occurs while checking for updates

data.name: ErrorReadingIssuesListMessage
data.value: Ein Fehler ist aufgetreten beim Abrufen der Ticketliste: {0}
data.comment: The message to display when an error occurs retrieving the issues list

data.name: ErrorReadingIssuesListTitle
data.comment: The title of the message to display when an error occurs retrieving the issues list

data.name: IssueText
data.comment: The text to apear in commit messages listing the issue numbers (Word List Item)

data.name: FeedParser_feedUrl_is_not_provided
data.value: Eine URL für die Ticketliste wurde nicht angegeben. Bitte überprüfen Sie die Einstellungen zum Fehlerverfolgungssystem in Tortoise.
data.comment: Error Message when Feed URL is missing.

data.name: ErrorColumnRequiredMessage
data.value: Es muss mindestens eine Spalte angezeigt werden!
data.comment: Message to display if all columns are removed in the column chooser

data.name: ErrorColumnRequiredTitle
data.comment: Title of the message to display if all columns are removed in the column chooser

data.name: AtomLoadComplete
data.value: Status: Abrufen der Ticketliste beendet. {0} Tickets angezeigt.
data.comment: Message to display when Atom feed has finished loading

data.name: AtomLoadFailed
data.comment: Message to display when Atom feed fails to load

data.name: AtomLoading
data.value: Status: Rufe Ticketliste als ATOM feed
data.comment: Message to display while Atom feed is loading

data.name: ColumnAuthor
data.comment: The issues list Author column

data.name: ColumnLastUpdated
data.comment: The issues list Last Updated column

data.name: ColumnNumber
data.comment: The issues list Number column

data.name: ColumnStatus
data.comment: The issues list Status column

data.name: ColumnSummary
data.comment: The issues list Summary column

data.name: ColumnType
data.comment: The issues list Type column

data.name: SearchBoxNoResults
data.comment: The Search box header when no results are found or no search has been performed

data.name: SearchBoxWithResults
data.comment: The Search box header with number or results in String formatter

data.name: VersionLabel
data.comment: Label to display version number

data.name: ProjectDetails_btnRepoPath_Click_Select_Repository_Location
data.comment: Select Repository Location Folder Browser Title

data.name: ProjectDetails_btnRepoPath_Click_This_directory_can_not_be_identified_1
data.value: Dieses Verzeichnis kann nicht als Repositoryverzeichnis für Subversion, Git oder Mecurial erkannt werden.
data.comment: Part one of can't identify directory message.

data.name: ProjectDetails_btnRepoPath_Click_This_directory_can_not_be_identified_2
data.comment: Second part of can't identify directory.

data.name: ProjectDetails_btnRepoPath_Click_Unknown_Repository_Type
data.comment: Unknown Repository Type Message Box Title

data.name: ErrorConfirmContinue
data.comment: Confirm continue on error

data.name: Confirm_Reset_Title
data.comment: Reset Confirmation Title

data.name: Confirm_Reset
data.value: Sind Sie sicher, dass sie die Einstellungen zurücksetzen wollen? Alle Änderungen gehen verloren!
data.comment: Confirm Reset message

data.name: RefsText
data.comment: The text to apear in commit messages listing the issue numbers (Word List Item)

data.name: NoneText
data.comment: The text to apear in commit messages listing the issue numbers (Word List Item) - None means no text

data.name: SearchFieldAllFields
data.comment: Text to display to indicate search on all fields from search box.

data.name: Confirm_Delete
data.value: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie dieses Element löschen wollen?
data.comment: Confirm delete message

data.name: Confirm_Delete_Title
data.comment: Confirm Delete Title

data.name: ErrorWordRequiredMessage
data.value: Sie müssen mindestens ein Wort in der Liste behalten!
data.comment: Message to display if all words are removed in the word list

data.name: ErrorWordRequiredTitle
data.comment: Title of the message to display if all words are removed in the word list

data.value: Neues Wort (Leer für einen leeren Eintrag):
data.comment: Dialog prompt for adding word to word list

data.comment: Dialog title for adding word to word list
